lead_info.additional_notes:
Travel arrangements are currently managed in-house.
They don't have much use or expenses that comes as travel.
They don't have any travel trips or business trips.
They have foreign clients that visit their office monthly.
They provide them a luxury experience.
They have a guy who takes care of the client visits.
This person is considered an employee.
It's costing a bit much right now.
Reducing the cost would be a reason to switch.
Doesn't want to manage the dashboard.
Prefers to keep another person to manage everything.
Wants something that he can just say to them that they are coming to all the renewals and they take care of it without him having the overhead.
If that cost a bit much more, he thinks that is fine.
He is hoping that he'll get the message that the agent sends and if he found it interesting, he'll reach out.
